bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.3.0 alluxio helm chart: 0.6.8 helm3 Describe the bug I install the alluxio with helm with the following value yaml tieredstore: levels: - level: 0 alias: HDD mediumtype: MEM,SSD path: /mnt/disk1,/mnt/disk2 type: hostPath quota: 1024G,1024G high: 0.95 low: 0.7 it's expected that mediumtype="MEM,SSD", mediumName resolves to mem-0 and ssd-1. But when I run helm template -f value.yaml alluxio The result is <denchmark-code>volumeMounts: - name: alluxio-domain mountPath: /opt/domain - mountPath: /mnt/disk1 name: mem- - mountPath: /mnt/disk2 name: ssd- </denchmark-code>
But it's illegal. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible)
Download the helm chart
<denchmark-code>git clone https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio.git cd alluxio/integration/kubernetes/helm-chart/ </denchmark-code>
2.Create the the yaml tieredstore: levels: - level: 0 alias: HDD mediumtype: MEM,SSD path: /mnt/disk1,/mnt/disk2 type: hostPath quota: 1024G,1024G high: 0.95 low: 0.7
Generate the template
<denchmark-code>helm template -f value.yaml alluxio </denchmark-code>
Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.
